recipes.name: chai
ingredients: 2 tea bags or 20 g loose tea leaves
instructions: Add tea leaves/tea bags, chai masala; mix and steep for 3-4 minutes
Remove mixture from heat; strain and enjoy

recipes.name: coffee
instructions: Pour coffee grounds in french press
Pour hot water over grounds in the french press
Steep for 3-4 minutes, and then press on plunger to strain
